subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Girly Boxes!?
author: Lisby
full_text:
And I thought mine was all posh with it's bits made out of plastic  
soda bottles. I'm jealous of that hot pink one.

I adore you, you mad scientist, you.

Ann
